about_the_game:
"Explosive Shooting Star Beetle" is an exhilarating bullet-hell shooter where you aim for explosive cherry chains. Collect as many cherries as you can and create massive combos!

◆single Player

Aim for high scores by chaining explosions and climb the leaderboard! Be cautious, though—the higher your score, the more challenging the explosions become.

◆online Multiplayer

You can also compete online. Create chains of explosions to generate nuisance blocks for your opponent. Push these blocks onto your opponent's screen to gain the upper hand in the game!

◆visuals

Enjoy charming and nostalgic 2D pixel art with a ladybug and star theme.

name: EXPLOSIVIE SHOOTING STAR BEETTLE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-1165G7 @ 2.80GHz(8CPUs) ~2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Lris(R) Xe Graphics Family
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 82 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required.

short_description: "Explosive Shooting Star Beetle" is an exhilarating bullet-hell shooter where you aim for explosive cherry chains. Collect as many cherries as you can to create massive combos! The game features both a single-player mode and an online multiplayer mode. Enjoy your favorite mode and have a blast!
